original_text: I should have stayed in that safe place. In my life, I only receive trouble and pain. When I die, all I will have is shame. I should have stayed in that safe place.
korean_text: 어찌하여 내가 태에서 나와서 고생과 슬픔을 보며 나의 날을 부끄러움으로 보내는고 하니라

sentences.original_text: I should have stayed in that safe place
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그 안전한 곳에 머물렀어야 했어

sentences.original_text: I only receive trouble and pain
all I will have is shame
I should have stayed in that safe place
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그 안전한 곳에 머물렀어야 했어
